altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.pt-br: Ganhei uma Nova Habilidade Toda Vez que Fui Exilado, e Após 100 Mundos Diferentes, Me tornei Imbativel

altTitles.vi: Nhận được một kỹ năng mới mỗi lần bị trục xuất, tôi trở nên bất bại sau 100 thế giới

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.vi: Ed, một lính đánh thuê bình thường, đột nhiên được triệu hồi tới một nơi kì lạ và thực hiện thử thách "Bị trục xuất khỏi 100 tổ đội anh hùng ở 100 thế giới khác nhau". Cậu đã hoàn thành thử thách nhưng vẫn phải nhận thêm một nhiệm vụ "Hãy nhìn vào kết cục của một trong những thế giới mà cậu đã đi qua" và cậu đã bị sốc khi quay lại đó.
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.en: One Punch-Man
One Punch Man
OPM

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

title.en: The Woman Who Messes With My Emotions (2022)

altTitles.ja: 情緒をめちゃくちゃにしてくる女

altTitles.en: A Woman Who Will Mess Up My Emotions

description.en:
Yuta was your typical introverted loser.

One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn.

Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...?

---

The serialized version of the original webcomic A Woman Who Will Mess Up Your Emotions.

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.ja: - [Seiga nicovideo](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/33204) (Alternate Raw)
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

title.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.en: Karate Survivor in Another World
Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生
野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

بیتریس

altTitles.ja: ベアトリチェ

altTitles.en: 比亚特丽丝
贝阿特丽刺

altTitles.th: เจ้าหญิงเบียทริซ

description.en:
Having previously been a slave in her youth, Chloe was revealed to be an illegitimate child of the King of Elpasa, and is raised to the level of a Princess and renamed Beatrice, all in order to secure a political marriage to a toady man, as the king was unwilling to marry his legitimate daughters to him. After two years of hellish marriage, the Kingdom of Elpasa falls before the blade of the Empire's Archduke, its greatest hero. In order to survive her new enslavement Princess Beatrice re-assumes the guise of 'Chloe' as a slave of the Empire. But then, she catches the eye of that very same hero…  
  
The Archduke wonders who is this squirrelly short-haired young woman, who is so surprisingly educated for a slave, and who is terrified of him, not knowing that he butchered the Elpasa Royal Family in front of her and enslaved her himself. What will become of them, since she proves to be one of his only sources of levity?  


---
description.ja: 帝国の侵略により滅亡したエルパーサ王国の王女ベアトリーチェは、正体を隠したまま帝国の奴隷クロエとしての人生を送ることになる。 新しい人生を切り開いて生きてきたのも束の間、彼女はエルパーサ王国を滅ぼし自分を殺そうとした帝国の英雄・アレクサンドロス大公の目につくようになる。 正体を隠すクロエと彼女の正体を知りたいアレクサンドロスのラブロマンス。
description.ru:
Когда королевство Эльпаса пало перед клинком величайшего героя империи, чтобы выжить, принцесса Беатрис приняла облик рабыни Хлои. Но потом она поймала взгляд того самого героя…

---

Updates every 10 days in the Kakao Page

description.en: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
description.ja: 陰キャな清己が忘れ物を取りに戻った放課後の教室。ギャルで有名な南條さんと男子生徒が、○○○しようとしているところを目撃する。逃げ出した男子生徒の代わりに…と誘われるものの、潔癖症の清己はきっぱり断ることに。けれど、それによって興味を持たれてしまい、清己は南條さんに付きまとわれることに！けれど、南條さんは、意外とオタクにとっての理想のギャルで…!?
description.pt-br: Do pior encontro deles surge uma história sobre sua felicidade final! Esta comédia romântica explora os altos e baixos de um relacionamento sério.

altTitles.en: Killing Blooms Under the Rounded Moon
Saku Kills on the Full Moon
Sword-Slicing Blossoms When the Moon is Full

altTitles.ja: 月輪に斬り咲く

description.en: A new transfer student has come into town, a girl with a mysterious air and black clothing who is called Inugami Sakuya. What few know is that by moonlight, she hunts and kills those possessed by "Inugami." A man can become possessed by being bitten, leading to a nighttime transformation into a beast driven to eat women. Sakuya gets no thanks for brutally ending the lives of these unfortunate men with her sword, and she is often too late to save the women they threaten. Sakuya also must deal with her own inner demons, which are all too real…
description.pt-br: Sakuya Inugami é uma misteriosa garota que caça seres chamados Inugami, homens que se transformam em terríveis feras comedoras de mulheres, após serem mordidos. Nessa difícil missão, Sakuya não recebe nenhum agradecimento e pior, tem que enfrentar seus próprios demônios internos.

title.en: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？

altTitles.en: What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?

description.en:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
description.ja: 文明を破壊し人類を蹂躙した突然変異の虫の化身"鎧蟲"。その唯一の対抗策は、鎧蟲とは異なる進化を遂げた"虫"を宿す少女たち、"蝶妃"だけ。万年蝶妃候補生のアユミは劣等生のレッテルを貼られ、絶望の淵に立ちながらも「世界を救う」という使命を胸に日々鍛錬を続ける。しかし努力の先にアユミを待ち受けていたのは、親友の裏切りと耐え難い現実で――。

title.en: The Girl with the Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.ja: 三白眼ちゃんは伝えたい

altTitles.en: The Feelings of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Mắt Tam Bạch Muốn Bày Tỏ

description.en:
This is a retelling of how Amane and Katou met, from The Story of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes.  
  
Trivia: Sanpaku (三白) is a Japanese term meaning "three whites". It is generally referred to in English as "sanpaku eyes" and refers to eyes in which the white space above or below the iris is visible.
description.vi: Xin giới thiệu Mizuno Amane, một cô nàng với cặp mắt tam bạch (sanpuku) dữ tợn và trái tim thiếu nữ dịu dàng! Amane đã phải lòng anh chàng bàn bên Katou mất rồi! Rồi bây giờ sẽ phải làm sao để bày tỏ nỗi lòng với chàng trai ấy đây?!

title.en: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.

altTitles.ja: 俺以外誰も採取できない素材なのに「素材採取率が低い」とパワハラする幼馴染錬金術師と絶縁した専属魔導士、辺境の町でスローライフを送りたい。

altTitles.en: The Assistant Mage Parts Ways With His Power Abusive Alchemist Childhood Friend and His Being Told to Have "Low Chance of Gathering Materials," and Wants to Start a Slow Life at a Town in the Remote Region

altTitles.id: Padahal Hanya Aku yang Dapat Mengumpulkan Material Itu, tapi Aku Dikatai "Tingkat Pengumpulan Materialmu Ampas" sama Teman Semasa Kecilku yang Menjadi Alkemis, Aku pun Pensiun Menjadi Asisten Penyihirnya dan Memulai Hidup Baru yang Santai di Kota Terpencil.

altTitles.vi: Trợ Lí Pháp Sư Vô Dụng Bắt Đầu Cuộc Sống Mới

description.en: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!
description.id: Asisten Penyihir, Lloyd, mempunyai kemampuan mengumpulkan material untuk alkemis yang rendah daripada orang lain yang membuat Alkemis yang menggangdengnya, Ruby, terus-terusan memarahi Lloyd yang dimatanya tidak pernah benar. Suatu hari dia muak dengan perlakuan Ruby yang makin menjadi-jadi dan memutuskan untuk pensiun menjadi asisten penyihirnya. Lantas, akan ke mana Lloyd pergi?
description.ja: 天才錬金術師ルビーの専属魔導士ロイドは、錬金術で使う素材の採取率が異常に低いため、ルビーのお荷物扱いとして国中の笑いものになっていた。ルビーからも毎日怒られる日々を過ごしていた彼だが、あまりにも絶望的なこの環境が嫌になりついに彼女との絶縁を決意する！しかし、みんなは知らなかった……。ロイドの揃える素材は、ほかの誰にも集められないような貴重なモノばかりだということに……。自他ともに「無能扱い」されていた魔導士が目指す、理想のスローライフ！

title.en: Koroshi Korosare Sankaku Kankei ni Watashi ga Ima kara Hairun desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 殺し殺され三角関係に私が今から入るんですか？

altTitles.en: Am I About to Join a Kill-Or-Be-Killed Love Triangle?

description.en: Kohaku is a girl who spent her junior high school years as a loner and dreams of living a fulfilling life in high school. However, on her first day of school she falls down the stairs and ends up hospitalized for a month! This means that everyone besides her has already formed a group of friends at school... In order to avoid being a loner, she summons up the courage and calls out to the only odd-numbered group in her class, but it seems that they are high up in the school caste system, and are actually involved in a blood-splattered love triangle with a non-human...!
description.ja: ぼっちな中学時代を過ごし、高校ではリア充生活を夢見る少女、コハク。だが入学初日に階段から足を滑らせてしまい、1か月入院することに！そうなると学校での友達グループも出来上がってしまっているわけで…。ぼっち回避のために勇気を出してクラス唯一の奇数人グループに声をかけるも、なんだかスクールカーストめっちゃ高そう＆実は人外混じりの百合百合血で血を洗う三角関係しており…！？目指せぼっち脱出ハイテンションハイスクールコメディ！

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

altTitles.en: Her Relationship with Him
Hayakawa-san and Miura-kun
Relationship Between the Couple

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)
description.ja:
「誰でもいいから、彼女になってくれんかねー」
「本当に誰でもいい？　私でも？」

男女交際に興味があるのに、彼氏はいたことがない高校２年生の早川夏帆。ある日、同級生の三浦拓海が彼女を欲しがっていることを知って、勢い余ってその場で交際を申し込んでしまった！履歴書で自己紹介、「恋人とやりたいことリスト」の共有、初めてのふれあい――。二人の不思議な関係は「お試し交際」を通じて段々深まっていって……!?
description.pt-br:
"Eu quero tanto uma namorada que me contentaria com qualquer uma a esta altura." 
"Sério? Qualquer uma? Até mesmo eu?" 

Kaho, que nunca teve um namorado antes, queria entrar em um relacionamento entre um homem e mulher.
Takumi, que queria uma namorada, por acaso estava falando sobre isso na frente dela. Uma história de amor emocionante sobre amadurecimento!

altTitles.ja: CreepyCat 猫と私の奇妙な生活

altTitles.uk: Моторошний кіт - Моє дивне життя з котиком

altTitles.ro: Pisica Ciudată - Viața Mea Zilnică cu o Pisică Ciudată

description.en: Flora just moved to an old house, but there's already a creepy cat living there. That's when their mysterious cohabitation began.
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.

title.en: Ainosenbiki ~Mama Katsu Shitara Mama ga Dekita Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: アイノセンビキ ～ママ活したらママができた話～

altTitles.ja-ro: Ai no Senbiki: Mamakatsu Shitara Mama ga Dekita Hanashi

altTitles.en: Ainosenbiki: A Story of Getting a Mommy After Doing Sugar Mama Dating

description.en: The protagonist ​​is a middle school boy named Hikawa Jun who lost his mother at birth. He glares at his classmates who complain about their own overprotective mothers and wonders what it would be like if he had a mother of his own. The story begins when Jun, who wants the warmth of a mother, lies about his age and matches up with a stranger on a sugar mama dating app.
description.es-la: La historia de cómo conseguí una mamá con una Sugar Mommy, Jun Hikawa, es un chico de secundaria que perdió a su madre al nacer. Mientras miraba con enojo a sus compañeros que se quejaban de sus madres sobreprotectoras, Jun soñaba con cómo sería tener una madre. La historia comienza cuando Jun, en su búsqueda del calor maternal, miente sobre su edad y se conecta con una mujer desconocida en una aplicación de Sugar mommy.

description.en: After facing off the last of the Otsutsuki clan members a forbidden seal activates on the last descendant’s body sending Naruto back into the past before his change began. Naruto is back in the academy with a few days remaining before the academy graduation exam. Naruto now has the opportunity to relive either as a loser who became the hero or awaken as a reborn genius that surpassed all his peers and changes the future.

title.en: Touhou Project Doujin - A Lovely Autumn Rendezvous

description.en:
A short oneshot part of the Mokou x Mystia series by Mitsumoto Jouji
Recommended to read "Sparrow's First Love" and "Night Sparrow In Love - The Complete Volume"  Prior to this oneshot

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.en: The Pinnacle of Martial Arts

altTitles.ja: 武錬天下

description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.vi: Võ đạo đỉnh phong, là cô độc, là tịch mịch, là dài đằng đẵng cầu tác, là cao xử bất thắng hàn Phát triển trong nghịch cảnh, cầu sinh nơi tuyệt địa, bất khuất không buông tha, mới có thể có thể phá võ chi cực đạo. Lăng Tiêu các thí luyện đệ tử kiêm quét rác gã sai vặt Dương Khai ngẫu lấy được một bản vô tự hắc thư, từ nay về sau đạp vào dài đằng đẵng võ đạo.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.es-la: El viaje hacia la cima marcial es solitario y largo. Ante la adversidad, debes sobrevivir y permanecer inflexible. Solo entonces podrás avanzar y continuar tu viaje para convertirte en el más fuerte. El "Pabellón Cielo Alto" pone a prueba a sus discípulos de las formas más duras para prepararlos para este viaje. Un día, el humilde barrendero Yang Kai logró obtener un libro negro, lo que lo puso en el camino hacia la cima del mundo marcial.
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

altTitles.en: Fairy Tail 100 Years Quest

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 桃草さんがものぐさすぎる!!

description.en:
A romantic comedy about a cute housekeeper who takes care of Momokusa-san in various ways ♡

Shoji Hatakeki, an ordinary high school boy, ends up working part-time as a housekeeper at the house of Momokusa, the most beautiful girl in school!!
Momogusa-san is a perfect girl who is talented and talented in both literary and military arts, but at home she becomes a super lazy "Momogusa-san"!?
For some reason, Hatakeki has grown fond of her, and ends up taking care of Momokusa, who is unsuspectingly pampered at close range...!?
A romantic comedy about flirtatious housework with a lazy girl!!
description.vi: Chuyện tình chàng giúp việc và nàng lười!

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party o Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.en: Betrayed by the Hero, I Formed a MILF Party with His Mom!
The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero's Mother!

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Dũng Sĩ Cướp Đi Mọi Thứ, Tôi Đã Lập Tổ Đội Cùng Với Mẹ Của Dũng Sĩ!

altTitles.uk: Я одружився з матір'ю героя, який забрав у мене все!

description.en: As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party. All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja: 勇者パーティの一員である主人公・セレスはある日、勇者ゼクトから突然のクビ宣告を受けてしまう。一人になったセレスは、身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。その奴隷市場で見かけたのは、奴隷として売られた勇者の母親である静子さんの姿で――？？
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.ja: よふかしのうた

altTitles.th: เพลงรักมนุษย์ค้างคาว

altTitles.vi: Khúc ca của kẻ dạo đêm
Khúc ca của kẻ ngụy thư

altTitles.en: Song of the Night Walkers
Call of the Night

description.en:
Unable to sleep or find true satisfaction in his daily life, Yamori Kou begins wandering the night streets. He encounters a strange girl who offers to help soothe his insomnia by sleeping beside him, but it is not merely a one-way exchange…

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Blue Orchestra**
description.fr:
Incapable de trouver le sommeil ni d'être pleinement satisfait de son quotidien‚ Yamori Kou commence à errer de nuit dans les rues. Il fait la rencontre d'une étrange fille qui l'aidera à calmer ses insomnies en dormant à ses côtés‚ mais ce ne sera pas un simple échange unilatéral…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kurokawa**
description.ja: 恋と青春は、夜に生まれる＿＿さあ、たのしい夜ふかしの時間だ！不眠が続く中２・夜守コウは、初めて一人外に出た夜、美しい吸血鬼・七草ナズナと出会う。「今日に満足できるまで、夜ふかししてみろよ。少年」彼女との二人きりの夜ふかしがコウの運命を大きく変えていく＿＿「これは、僕が、七草ナズナに恋をするための物語だ」眠れない夜を過ごす全ての人へ贈る＿＿真夜中のボーイ・ミーツ・ガール！連載開始から超絶大反響！！ふたり　たのし　よふかし　ラブストーリー開幕！！
description.ru: Не в состоянии заснуть или найти что-то позитивное в своей жизни, Ямори Кой начинает бродить по ночному городу, где он встречает странную девушку, которая предлагает ему свою помощь в борьбе с бессонницей путем сна рядом с ним.
description.uk: Позбавлений можливості спати, не задоволений своїм повсякденним життям, Ко Яморі перестає ходити до школи та береться поночі блукати вулицями. Там він зустрічає дівчину, на ім’я Надзуна Нанакуса, котра надає життю Ко нову сутність; укусом у шию і наступним перетворенням його на вампіра.
description.es-la: Incapaz de dormir o encontrar satisfacción en su vida diaria, Yamori Kou comienza a explorar la ciudad por la noche, donde conoce a una extraña chica que le ofrece ayudarle con su insomnio durmiendo a su lado.

altTitles.ja: 瀬戸さんを笑わせたい紬ちゃん

altTitles.en: Tsumugi-chan Wants to Make Seto-san Laugh

description.en:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
description.ja: キレイでかっこいい学級委員長の瀬戸さん。笑った顔はきっと素敵なはず。……見たい！ 入学式のときからちょっと接点があったドジっ子の紬ちゃんが、果敢に瀬戸さんを笑わそうと多彩な作戦を繰り出して失敗するショートコミック。……なのだけど、瀬戸さんの様子がどうもおかしい！！！！

title.en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island with Four Beautiful Girls

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.ja: コトダマ叶えて！ ときえ先生

altTitles.en: Through the Power of Words, Grant Me My Wishes, Tokie-sensei

description.en:
In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. 

From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students. Enjoy this comedic story filled with very amusing moments between a teacher who thrives on obeying words and some very mischievous students.

title.en: Doumo, Zense de Satsuriku no Madougu wo Tsukutteita Shishaku Reijou desu.

altTitles.ja: どうも、前世で殺戮の魔道具を作っていた子爵令嬢です。

description.en: The viscount's daughter, Chloe, was the chief magical tools artisan for a country that perished a thousand years ago in her previous life.  On the country's orders, she had created many weapons of slaughter. She laments her previous life and decides to, "live a respectable life this time." One day, at her graduation party, her best friend's engagement is broken off because of a lie. Chloe tries to save her best friend by unraveling the truth.

title.en: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる

altTitles.en: The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi
Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of This Scary Consignee Girl
The Story of a Scary Consignee
The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary Story

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
description.ja: 心機一転を求めて、生まれ育ったハルバル町から引っ越すことになったひきこもりの少年・サニー。町を発つ3日前、幼なじみのケルに誘われて4年ぶりに家を出ると、以前とすっかり変わってしまった、かつての親友たちと再会する…。
description.uk: Після того, як—щось—змінилося в його житті чотири роки тому, Санні не виходив з дому навіть раз, живучі у своїй одинокій бульбашці. Сподіваючись на свіжий старт для свого сина, його мати вирішує вивезти родину з міста. Однак, коли його друг дитинства, Кел, повертається в його життя, Санні знову опиняється у світі, який він колись знав. Маючи тільки три дні до переїзду, хлопаки зустрічають знайомі обличчя, проходячи містом і пробуджуючи темні спогади, які Санні так сильно хотів забути.

altTitles.en: Just Twilight
Just Dawn

description.en: She was like a typhoon. One that carelessly disturbed the season he had been quietly living through. "Nothing good will come from associating with me." "Why? Because of the rumours about you? I don't care about them." Should I protect her, or break her? The night I spent agonising over those innumerable impulses repeated itself after 13 years. It was because of her, whose firsts I wanted to remember. "A man who runs away after only taking a kiss?" "The one... who ran away first was you." So you didn't like it? As she looked into my eyes and provoked me with that throat of hers, I would have rather bit and shred it to pieces. "You... You're good at driving people insane." She wasn't something he could avoid in the first place. That was who 'Yun Junyoung' was to him.
description.id:
Semua hal pertama yang selalu kuingat adalah ketika bersamamu.

Dari musim panas pada usia 18 tahun yang aku belum tahu apa-apa, hingga musim panas pada usia 31 tahun ini, yang aku telah mengetahui banyak hal., Namun, pada musim-musim yang berlalu tanpa dirimu itu yang tertanam dalam hatiku hanya ketika bersamamu.

“Tidak ada gunanya bagimu mengenal diriku”

Dengan wajah yang tanpa ekspresi, kau mendorongku pergi lagi seperti itu. Tapi kau tidak pernah tahu apa yang aku rasakan selama hari-hari tanpa dirimu. Kemudian sekarang kau ingin membuatku merasakannya lagi. 

“Kau bertanya apa aku membutuhkan seorang pria? Apakah kau akan menjadi pria itu jika aku mengiyakan pertanyaanmu?"

Kau harus mengenalku yang berusia 31 tahun ini. Karena saat ini kau sedang memandangku dengan mata yang seolah tidak pernah mengenalku sama sekali. 

“Kau ini pandai sekali membuat orang jadi gila.”

Karena selama kau telah ada di sisiku, senja yang temaram pun menjadi begitu hangat menyinari hatiku.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram no colégio, mas vão se separar e se reencontrar quando forem adultos. Toda primeira vez que quero me lembrar de algo, acabo pensando em você. Do verão de 18 anos, quando não sabia nada, até o verão de 31…. “Ficar perto de mim não vai te fazer nenhum bem.” Você me afastou com cara de choro, mas ainda não sabe o que aguentei naqueles dias incontáveis porque nos aproximamos. Então você está repetindo a mesma futilidade de novo. “Você perguntou se eu precisava de um homem? Se necessário, você será meu?” “Você tem que conhecer meu eu de 31 anos.” “Você é bom em deixar as pessoas loucas.”

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

altTitles.en: Revolving Battles of Curse Arts
Revolving Battles of Sorcery
Sorcery Fight

altTitles.th: มหาเวทย์ผนึกมาร

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, he soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ja: 類稀な身体能力を持つ高校生・虎杖悠仁（いたどりゆうじ）は、病床に伏せる祖父の見舞いを日課にしていた。だがある日学校に眠る「呪物」の封印が解かれ、化物が現れてしまう。取り残された先輩を救う為、校舎へ乗り込む虎杖だが!?
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

title.en: Isekai de Cheat Skill wo Te ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai wo mo Musou Suru ~Level Up wa Jinsei wo Kaeta~

altTitles.en: I Got a Cheat Ability in a Different World, and Became Extraordinary Even in the Real World.

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Cheat Nouryoku Ote ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai o mo Musou Suru.

altTitles.ru: Я обрёл читерскую способность в другом мире и стал необычайным человеком в этом мире. История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.
Я получил читерские способности в другом мире, и стал экстраординарным в реальном мире~ История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.

altTitles.ja: 異世界でチート能力（スキル）を手にした俺は、現実世界をも無双する ～レベルアップは人生を変えた～
異世界でチート能力を手にした俺は、現実世界をも無双する

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界得到開掛能力的我、現實世界中也舉世無雙

altTitles.en: I Got a Cheat Skill in Another World and Became Unrivaled in The Real World, Too

altTitles.zh: 异世界得到开挂能力的我、现实世界中也举世无双

altTitles.th: สกิลโกงไร้เทียมทาน สร้างตำนานในสองโลก

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 치트 능력(스킬)을 손에 넣은 나는, 현실 세계에서도 무쌍한다

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Cheat Nōryoku (Skill) o Te ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai o mo Musō Suru ~ Level Up wa Jinsei o Kaeta ~

altTitles.en: Iseleve

altTitles.vi: Gian Lận Tăng Cấp Ở Thế Giới Khác Đã Thay Đổi Cuộc Đời Tôi
Tôi Trở Nên Phi Thường Ngay Cả Ở Thế Giới Thật
Sau Khi Có Được Năng Lực Bá Đạo Ở Dị Giới, Tôi Cũng Vô Đối Ở Thế Giới Thực: Thăng Cấp Xong Thì Cuộc Đời Cũng Thay Đổi

description.en:
Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.
He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.
While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.
Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is…
description.pt-br: Tenjo Yuuya sofre bully desde criança. Sua vida se resumia em passar o tempo na casa de seu avô e ir para a escola. Porém, ele sofria uma rotina diária de bully severo em sua escola, algumas vezes o pobre Yuuya se via obrigado a pedir licença para curar suas feridas. Mas em uma dessas licenças, ele acaba descobrindo um armazém de objetos que seu avô guardava, e entre esses objetos estava uma porta misteriosa. E claro, ele abriu a porta, e lá ele encontrou…

altTitles.th: เบ้าหน้าฟ้าประทาน

altTitles.ja: ルックス天才

description.en:
One day, I suddenly gained the ability to transform into a game character! 
With these abilities and appearances under my belt, I can now become a "face genius" whenever I want!
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 게임 캐릭터로 변신하는 능력이 생겼다!
그 스킬과, 그 모습이 모두 내 것이다.
나는 이제 언제든 "얼굴천재"가 된다!
description.ru: У меня нет друзей и девушки, а моя семья очень бедная. Но однажды меня бьёт током, и я превращаюсь в лекаря-красавчика из игры! И, кажется, у меня появились невероятные способности! Скоро моя жизнь изменится!
description.th: ใบหน้าที่แม้แต่เด็กที่กำลังร้องไห้ยังต้องหยุดร้อง ตั้งแต่หัวจรดเท้าที่ทุกสายตาต่างจับจ้องแม้อยู่ท่ามกลางสายฝน ผู้ชายที่ทำให้ความเร่งรีบบนท้องถนนหยุดซะงักเสมอ คนคนนั้นก็คือผม จอนจีอุง
description.zh:
平凡少年偶获捏脸能力！
小透明惊变绝世大帅哥！
平凡少年全志雄意外被电击后竟拥有了可以变身为游戏人物的能力。并且变身后可以拥有该人物的技能和长相。他还可以随时随地的进行变化。默默无闻的他突然变成人见人爱，车见车爆胎的大帅哥，整个生活也因此发生了改变...但还有什么考验在等待着志雄呢？
description.zh-hk: 某一天， 我突然有了變成遊戲人物的能力！ 擁有了那些技能跟外表。我現在不管何時都能成為「臉蛋天才」！

altTitles.ja: ばっどがーる

description.en:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
description.ja: （自称）不良高校生、風紀委員長にコヒュらされる日々!?※「コヒュ-る」【動詞】…驚きやときめきによって息がコヒュッとなる。【あらすじ】風紀委員長・亜鳥に憧れ、気を引きたい一心でなぜか不良を目指すことにした高校一年生・優。しかしワルくてカッコいいところをアピールするはずが、天真爛漫で人たらしな亜鳥の言動に小動物のごとく翻弄される…!?

altTitles.en: Criminal Parasites

altTitles.ja: 極道パラサイツ

description.en: Mai Shintani, who works at the Kitakabane Police Station was suddenly assigned in the "Organized Crime Countermeasures Division", commonly known as the "Sotai". Immediately after that, she gained influence within her jurisdiction. The leader of expanding yakuza faction "Tatsygamigumi" Shogo Mikuro mysteriously disappeared. There's a tension in the conflict between cases of opposing Yakuza groups. And for some reason, Shintani is looking composed at the northern police station. Behind it is an absurd shocking truth?!

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.en: Farming Life in Another World

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**

description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl
Happy Life with my Girlfriend

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

title.en: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトの元アイドルが、とにかく挙動不審なんです。

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Idol Bishoujo ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin nan desu

altTitles.en: The Idol Girl in My Class is Acting Suspiciously

altTitles.vi: Idol Cùng Lớp Tôi Cứ Đáng Nghi Thế Nào Ấy

altTitles.en: My classmate SHION SAEGUSA was idol, but she is unsure of behavior in front of me.

description.en: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
description.ja: 高校進学を機にアイドルを引退した三枝さんは、容姿端麗かつ頭脳明晰。いつも明るくて人当たりも良く、学校で一番の人気者だ。しかし、そんな高嶺の花である三枝さんのとある一面を卓也は知っている。今日もバイト先のコンビニに現れる、怪しげな変装をした挙動不審な女性――。彼女はどう見てもあの三枝さんで…!?
description.vi: Saegusa, người đã từ bỏ thần tượng khi cô học trung học, xinh đẹp và thông minh. Cô ấy luôn vui vẻ và thân thiện, và là người nổi tiếng nhất ở trường.Tuy nhiên, Takuya biết một khía cạnh nào đó của cô gái saegusa nàyHôm nay cũng vậy, một cô gái trông đáng ngờ đang cải trang xuất hiện tại cửa hàng tiện lợi nơi anh làm việc bán thời gian.Cô ấy, rất có thể, là Saegusa-san...?Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ truyện tranh được chờ đợi từ lâu của bộ phim hài lãng mạn cực kỳ nổi tiếng với một nữ idol đáng ngờ và dễ thương quá mức!

title.en: How to Hide the Emperor's Child

altTitles.de: Astelle und der geheime Sohn des Kaisers

altTitles.fr: Comment cacher le fils de l'empereur

altTitles.es: Como ocultar al hijo del emperador

altTitles.es-la: Cómo esconder al hijo del emperador

altTitles.mn: Хэрхэн эзэн хааны хүүхдийг нуух вэ?

altTitles.th: วิธีซ่อนทายาทของจักรพรรดิ

altTitles.ja: 皇帝の子供を隠す方法

description.en:
Astelle, the empire's one-day empress brought with her a secret when she left the palace after the divorce: she was pregnant with Emperor Kaizen's child. Six years later, Astelle is living a peaceful life in the countryside with their son until the imperial guards come knocking. Kaizen requires Astelle's consent to receive the key territory of Meilen. With the empire still in turmoil from a rebellion, will Astelle be able to hide her son's identity from these threatening forces, and more importantly, from his father, the emperor?

---
“You never loved me anyway, right?”

Astelle’s long-awaited marriage life ended in a day.

She worked hard to become Kaizen’s wife since she was ten, 
however, the only thing that was left for her was a disgrace as the banished-empress.

She was abandoned by her family; 
She was kicked out by the man she loved, Kaizen.

“Yes. You’re right. I didn’t love you.”

Astelle lied for the last time. 
For the sake of the man who was her reason to live and it was also for him who was her husband for a day.

She thought there is no point tp contact with him again, but-

“I think… I might be pregnant?”

–

Six years later, Astelle, who reunited with Kaizen, lied again.

“You… who is that child?”

“He’s my nephew.”

For the sake of protecting the child.

---

description.ko:
"이혼해 줘, 아스텔.
어차피 당신도 날 사랑한 적 없잖아?"

황제 카이젠만을 바라보며
완벽한 황후가 되기 위해 노력했던 아스텔.
하지만 카이젠의 이혼 요구에
아스텔의 10년이 하룻밤만에 부서졌다.

다시는 황실과 얽히지 않으리라 다짐하며
가족과의 연까지 끊어내고,
시골로 몸을 숨기지만…

"…임신, 하신 것 같습니다."

과연 아스텔은 카이젠과 위협 세력으로부터
황제의 아이, 테오르를 무사히 숨길 수 있을까?

---

description.uk:
"Дай мені розлучення, Астель".
Шлюб Астель не протримався і дня.
Вона тяжко працювала, щоб стати дружиною Кайзена, однак лишилася з ганьбою та прізвиськом вигнаної імператриці.
Родина її покинула.
Як і чоловік, якого вона кохала.
"Так. Твоя правда. Я тебе не кохала".
Збрехала вона наостанок.
Вона вважала, що більше ніколи з ним не зустрінеться, однак...
"Ви носите дитину".
Шість років по тому, побачивши Кайзена, вона знову йому збрехала.
"Що це за дитя?"
"Мій небіж".
Вона має захистити свого сина, що б там не стало.

---

description.en:
A “red” comet, a black “three” binary star, and a blue “giant star” -- we are the “red three giant stars”!
Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After finishing the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon army "Wandering Group" was retreating. Somehow, they made it to space where their friends were... Meanwhile, a unit of the Federation Forces, the Red Three Giants, appeared!

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ
Satanofani

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people.
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

description.en: The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

altTitles.vi: Vợ trong game của tôi là Idol nổi tiếng ngoài đời

description.en: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
description.ja: 平凡な男子高校生・綾小路和斗には嫁がいる。ただし趣味のネトゲ世界で。ところが結婚相手の少女リンの正体は、学校のクラスメイトで人気アイドルの『水樹凛香』で!? 正体がバレて関係も終わり――かと思いきや、凛香は現実でも和斗の「嫁」として振る舞い始めて……。
description.vi: Ayanokouji Kazuto là một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường. Cậu có sở thích là chơi game vào thời gian rảnh của mình. Một ngày, cậu phát hiện ra danh tính thật của người bạn thân mà cậu đã kết hôn trong game. Người đó không ai khác chính là Rinka Mizuki, một idol và cũng là một người bạn cùng lớp của cậu. Trong khi Mizuki Rinka cố gắng để cư xử với cậu như một người vợ, cậu phải trải qua một cuộc sống hằng ngày mệt mỏi.

altTitles.en: Adachi and Shimamura

altTitles.ja: 安達としまむら

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

description.en:
"I can't live without you!"

A cohabiting yuri couple, Anzu and Mitsuki, have a relationship where they simply can’t live without each other! A lighthearted and sweet Girls' Love comedy that depicts the lovey-dovey everyday lives of this co-dependent couple. ♪
description.ja:
「アナタがいなくちゃダメなの!」
同棲中の百合ップル、あんずとみつきはお互いにお互いなしではいられない関係。
そんなふたりのいちゃラブな日常を描いた、ゆる甘共依存ガールズラブコメディ♪
